fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Carve a Jack-o-lantern at night and place it at a player's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you carve a Jack-o-lantern you may choose to carve a different face on it, each face has a different effect.
 - Joy-o-lantern: Everyone who visits that player's house learns who visits them at night
 - Mad-o-lantern: Everyone who tries to visit that player's house that night gets roleblocked.
 - Sad-o-lantern: The player becomes vulnerable for the night.
- You are not affected by any Jack-o-lantern effects.
- You cannot place a Jack-o-lantern on your own house.
